original: grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: cho 'phrul bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis //

original: bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i bu mos 'o ma drangs //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i bu mos 'o ma drangs //

original: bka' dang @82b 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa //
analyzed: bka' dang @82b 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa //

original: nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //

original: byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te //

analyzed: sdom dang tshul khrims la ni rab bkod pa'i //

original: rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the pure Stupas.游댷With the intention of taming impermanent beings,

original: sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar //
analyzed: sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar //
translated: And at the end of all his deeds, descending from the gods,

analyzed: tsun das gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin //

original: mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
analyzed: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Stupas of the Eight Great Places
